item.title: About
item.author: jihan1218@gmail.com (Jihan Kim)
item.description: Hello, my name is Jihan Kim. I am a physicist transitioning into AI research scientist. I love to learn new things and challenge myself to solve hard problems. I graduated from Oregon State University with PhD in physics on December 2019. Throughout my graduate program, I studied how breast cancer cells and surrounding extracellular matrix (ECM) interact bidirectionally. One way, cancer cells remodel ECM to modify physical properties and geometrical architectures.
